Key Match Events: James McArthur allowed a walk-off double to Jose Altuve in Kansas Cityâ€™s 3-2 loss.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Seth Lugo threw seven solid innings while the Royals nearly stole a victory from the Astros.
Lugo surrendered one run on six hits with nine strikeouts.
Lugo had a balanced attack, using nine different pitches.
Lugo got 11 whiffs, three of which came off the cutter.
Paul DeJong tied it at 2 with a two-run homer into the Crawford Boxes off Josh Hader with one out in the ninth.
